heading: Usun an elter me pris fori efeiochun ewe pinewan sakrament a awewetiw. Arap ngeni Ierin ewe Samon 401–421.

verses.txt: Ewe napanapen nour kewe elter me pris ar fori angangen aionen me chan Kraist ngeni ewe mwichefen; iwe ra efeiochu anongonong won ekkewe annuk an Kraist; ina minne sia sinei ewe napanap pwe mi ennet; iwe ewe elter are pris a efeiochu—
Iwe ra fotopukutiw fiti chon ewe mwichefen, me iotek ngeni ewe Sam non iten Kraist, ra apasa:

O Kot, Samach mi Napanap, sia tingor ngonuk fan iten Noum we, Jises Kraist, om kopwene efeiochu me epinano ei pinewa ngeni aionen meinisin ekkewe ra angei, pwe repwe ani achechemenien inisin Noum we, me pwarata ngonuk, O Kot, Samach mi Napanap, pwe ra mochen ar repwe mwarei iten Noum we, o chechemeni i fansoun meinisin, me fori an kewe annuk a ngeni ir, pwe Ngunun epwe nonnom rer fansoun meinisin. Amen.
